title: Does the United States Republic of America oppose the preservation of daytime because it accelerates climate change?
subtitle: Alexandrian Congresswoman Okasio-Cortez has proposed a number of ideas to combat global warming.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The Republic of the United States of America, Alexandria Okasio-Cortez, stated that it was opposed to saving time in daylight because "the extra hour of sunlight greatly accelerates climate change."
